entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Manicouagan
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to light snow or periods of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
